title: Brown Mushroom

verbs: Can be used to represent foraging, cooking, or enjoying nature.
nouns: Represents a brown mushroom, a natural edible fungus.

description: A brown-capped mushroom with a short stem, symbolizing edible fungi found in nature. Often used to represent cooking, nature, or organic living.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the brown mushroom emoji is depicted as a softly shaded toadstool with a rounded brown cap and a smooth beige stem. Its realistic texture and balanced proportions give it a tactile, natural look. It‚Äôs commonly used to represent earthy foods, healthy eating, or whimsical forest imagery.
